title: Face
description:
1-3: Face, Let's Keep It A Secret
Sakurada of the Tokyo metropolitan police is assigned to cover personal security for Prince Noora during the prince's trip to Japan. The prince takes his official duties seriously, but in his downtime all he cares about is cute boys and teasing his security personnel. Sometimes he acts extremely un-princelike, triggering disturbing suspicions for Sakurada.

4-6: Not Love
When Tomobe Yoshihito's cousin commits suicide, the carefree writer takes in her young, bratty son who's obsessed with buying his mother a grave. Soon, their clashing personalities drive the child away, but he returns ten years later, determined to recover the money his mother left behind by any means necessary.

7: All Of Heaven And Hell
A short update for Shirota and Himeno from [url=https://mangadex.org/title/39104/]Tengoku mo Jigoku mo[/url].
